website_summaries.verdict: This economical little device sports a straightforward design that results in a perfectly peeled apple in just a few seconds.
pros: Includes a pair of replaceable blades
Strong suction cups hold peeler in place
Features protective covers for all stainless steel parts
cons: It is a little too easy to get cut if you aren’t paying attention

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and F A S T !
customer_reviews.text: No assembly required. Very easy to use. Suction cups don’t work well on my counter, but that doesn’t bother me and won’t detract from my rating. I just hold it down (see video). I tried it on a potato and it did not work well because of the indentations and uneven shape, but this is really made for apples. Peels one in just a few seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Daneydoo

customer_reviews.title: I love apples and this peeler!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this apple peeler for my son who has had numerous heart surgeries and needs to eat healthy. It's great. Gets the job done quickly and suction cups attach snugly to the stove (which I neglected to do in my video but it still worked great.) I love it. Well worth the price. I'm going to buy another one for my office.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened this, I thought I was in for disappointment. It sure didn't look like it would work smoothly and efficiently. However, I popped my first apple on there and away it went! It can peel a whole apple in seconds! It takes just the thin skin off, no gouges or otherwise. It stuck to the counter and turning the handle was not cumbersome or hard. Would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: Ochhh
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bad boy for the kids thinking "Ya, Mom Win. No More Knicking My Knuckles As I Peel Their Apples. Hey, It Looks Simple Enough. Maybe They Can Use It To." It Arrived Yesterday And Within 5 Minutes It Almost Took Off My Finger While I Was Unwinding The Clap That Is Meant To Hold The Apple. Needless To Say The Kids Won't Be Using It And I'm Now Afraid Of It. I Am An Accident Waiting To Happen. 😶🍎🍏
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: I made the right choice, first time!
customer_reviews.text: The Apple corer was just what we were looking for. We peel and juice easily 100-160 apples weekly. It’s become so easy to stick it on spikes, let it take one spin and then use the decorer to be ready to juice ASAP. Each apple is done in a few seconds. As you’ll read in some reviews, the blade is sharp so be careful and let it finish its revolution before pulling it off the machine so you don’t cut yourself. I’ve got long, semi fat fingers, so I’ll let my partner do it for me. She gets it done easy then as they get done, I move to the juicer. Teamwork makes the dream work definitely!
customer_reviews.author: DeSean

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome for peeling apples! the only thing that I did not like, is that it does have a tab where you can get the apple off easier but my apples must have been to big because it wouldn't get it off and I cut myself trying to get the apple off since the shaver is so close, but overall this thing is really worth it.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product, if you use it for what it's intended for. It will take the skin off a normal apple in a few seconds with very little waste.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Howard

customer_reviews.title: No English instructions
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful apple peeler. Does a great job with very little effort. Major complaint is no English instructions. Should be instructions on how to get a replacement blade when & if needed IN ENGLISH. Where can I find replacement blades?
customer_reviews.author: Maine Guide Bob

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Clever Peeler
customer_reviews.text: Great little peeler. I bought it because my metal one ‘mysteriously’ disappeared. I was a little skeptical when I took it out of the box because it was so lightweight. Well, I just love this thing. It’s very easy to use. It takes just the right amount of skin off. My old one really took a lot off. It doesn’t take the core out-but I like that. It’s less messy. I have issues with my wrist and it’s also much easier to use. I will probably buy another for my RV.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen tool!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it, til the blade got dull. It came with an extra blade, I just need to find it. I really can't live without it! I probably peeled 50 or sixty apples before it got dull. If you hate peeling apples, you'll love this clever gadget. I wish I could buy extra blades in bulk, because sharpening the blade is not as good as the new ones. Oh, and don't forget to buy a corer/slicer!
customer_reviews.author: Charles S.

customer_reviews.title: WHERE HAS THIS BEEN MY WHOLE BAKING LIFE?
customer_reviews.text: WHERE HAS THIS BEEN MY WHOLE BAKING LIFE? For real, this is so, so great. It takes a few seconds to peel each apple and has made making apple pies so, so, so much easier. I have hurt myself so many times using a peeler, and this couldn't be safer or easier. I have granite countertops and the suction cups are very strong and hold well. It even comes with a replacement blade, but I imagine this will last quite a while. Really easy to clean, too. Definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Paxton & Bevin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & clean
customer_reviews.text: I have to peel several apples everyday and this is a super quick way to do it. Works very well and very easy to clean. This is the best apple peeler I've found!
customer_reviews.author: ItsWinston

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe I used to peel my apples by hand. This tool makes it so much faster, and it’s kind of fun! It’s easy to disassemble and clean. The suction cups really hold it in place. The razor blade is very sharp, too, so follow the directions on how to remove the apple to avoid being cut. Thanks for cutting my apple peeling time in half!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Heidner

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice gadget. When you have a lot of apples to peel and freeze this comes in hand. Simply place the apple on the end and turn the handle. As the handle turns the blade moves in towards the apple and peels it. My mom left me use hers and that's what caused me to buy my own.
customer_reviews.author: Windber, PA

customer_reviews.title: Peels apples SOO fast
customer_reviews.text: My son is addicted to apples but unfortunately, won't eat the peels. I can't begin to tell you how much time it takes to peel apple after apple after apple. I tried the one that peels, slices and cores, which is really awesome, but I could never adjust it quite right where I didn't lose half the apple or the corer was way off center because the apple wasn't perfectly shaped. This device is so simple...just pop the apple on the stem and turn the handle until the peel is gone. It only slices the peel, never the apple. I love this!
customer_reviews.author: Luci K

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, suction doesn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: My kids love apples so I use this little machine quite often to peel 3-5 apples at once. I also have an Apple slicer so the two combined make it very quick and easy to peel and slice the apples. Great for quick lunches in the morning for school. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: Fast service. Item as described. Works awesome! Would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca A. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: It works?
customer_reviews.text: Overall satisfied with product, suction cups didnt stick well to granite, but just hold the base. Thin peeling, no waste of apple meat. Saved me alot of time peeling 6 lbs of apples.
customer_reviews.author: Southerncanuck

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expensive peelers that I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these years ago which I paid $5.00 to purchase. It lasted for a long time but eventually had to be replaced. I could not find another one like it. There for I have purchased peeler that were alot more expensive from popular name brand dealers. None worked as well as this product. I purchased more than one this time.
customer_reviews.author: Deblee

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with it. It’s enexpensive enough, good value if it lasts.
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job peeling. Handle keeps falling off. Seller suggested I could glue in place which I did and that seems to solve problem. One can peel a great number of apples in a very short time.
customer_reviews.author: H. Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Apple lovers' favorite
customer_reviews.text: My kids love apples, but they don't eat the skin. So I have to peel them manually every time. This will save you a lot time and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Great peeler but suction not great
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at how well it works peeling the apple. Only disappointment is that it doesn't suction down very well.
customer_reviews.author: kbrx

customer_reviews.title: Works but very sharp
customer_reviews.text: When you place apple in holder, please make sure to rotate the blade so it is not exposed. Otherwise, you can easily get cut. It works a lot better than using a hand peeler and is quic.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful product. This makes peeling fast and efficient. There will be a lot more apple pies being made in my kitchen now. I'm very happy with my new gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy P

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother!
customer_reviews.text: It’s plastic and cheaply made. It comes apart even trying to peel an apple. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Took me a minute to figure this out but once I did it was fabulous. Worth every penny. Will be well used.
customer_reviews.author: Karolina

customer_reviews.title: Remove the cutting part first before removing the apple.
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it. The only thing about it. Is that you'll need to remove the cutting piece off before removing the apple. It will cut you. It have cut me and my 12 year old. My son's cut was worst than mine.
customer_reviews.author: Cherrios

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease of use with this product. The only downside is the suction cups on bottom does not really hold. But not a reason for me to not buy or use the product. It saves a lot of time and again easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: AMP

customer_reviews.title: Works well with all apples
customer_reviews.text: I liked this so much I ordered four more for my friends. It does occasionally get stuck. In this case, I have to help it rotate the apple. The previous apple peeler was a sturdy red metal deal but it couldn't handle large diameter red delicious apples. I even use it for suitably round cooking potatoes (Yukon gold, melody, dore, salad potatoes -- not russet) although it needs assistance in rotating the potato.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Myers

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Peels apples quickly and easily. Not sure it will hold up as it is light weight but it is well worth the price. Peeled a bushel with no complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Coakley

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be sorry you bought it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest little gadget I’ve ever bought! I just peeled an apple in about 3 seconds and the peel all came off in one piece! If I could give it 10 stars I would!
customer_reviews.author: M Susan Stine

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite peeler!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean, comes with extra blades and core and blade cover. Love how compact it is. My teens and I use it weekly. Much better than expected! Received quick.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Anne

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great!! Ease, simple and does what it claims.
customer_reviews.author: proadvantage

customer_reviews.title: Great timesaver!
customer_reviews.text: Well designed and useful kitchen tool, a real timesaver. Great value for the price. Won't last forever, but seems pretty well made. We like it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron G.

customer_reviews.title: Love IT
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter doesn't like the hull on the apple. Its really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: B L Randall

customer_reviews.title: You can't buy new blades
customer_reviews.text: Nice product,but you can't buy blades for it. Once the blades get dull , I guess you throw it away and buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Candie

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: Peeled a bushel of apples in no time. worked great
customer_reviews.author: Soho

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality cutter. Gearing not smooth cutting is very wavy cupping on apple. 4 suction cups n only 1 work on a glass table. Claim it comes with 2 replacements blades. No replacement comes with it. Position of blade after use is very close to hand in any angle u put it. Don’t waste $ on this.
customer_reviews.author: Shiren ruan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent peeler!
customer_reviews.text: This has been an excellent peeler for lots of apples of all different sizes! Would recommend highly!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Just be careful
customer_reviews.text: There are no instructions/warnings in the box. I put the apple on and it peeled it great. When I went to remove the apple, I sliced my thumb - deep - on the blade by accident.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Bittner

customer_reviews.title: That it is durable
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap and too many parts to change. It would take me hours to peel apples with this peeler.
customer_reviews.author: Ann H. Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Product is so amazing! It peels an apple in less than 10 seconds. Blade comes with a cover. Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: AbLincoln2

customer_reviews.title: Independent learning
customer_reviews.text: My toddler can now confidently peel an apple! The suction at the bottom isn’t great, but we still use this on a daily basis
customer_reviews.author: SunnyDay

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. So easy to use. Makes peeling apples a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Martins

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a toy but works great.
customer_reviews.text: Suction cups could be stronger but works pretty good if you moisten the cups first. Didn’t expect much but it really works. All I needed was to peel the apple and it did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice O.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I had used several other Apple Peelers, but this one worked the best.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B

customer_reviews.title: Apple Peeler
customer_reviews.text: I l iked that it peeled the apple well and you are left with one long peel.
customer_reviews.author: Vada Hyman

customer_reviews.title: Product review
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how well it works! We use it every day since my two kids love apples!
customer_reviews.author: jann

customer_reviews.title: Simple, fast and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews but was hesitant to purchase this little gadget. I'm so glad I did; it was all I hoped it to be! It's very easy to use, super fast peeling apples (unlike my manual attempts that cut out more apple than peel) and was very easy to clean. Love, love, love this!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Barrows

customer_reviews.title: Fastest apple peeler!
customer_reviews.text: Great apple peeler. Fast and easy. I purchased the corer/slicer separately and both are fabulous. Very easy to make apple desserts-especially pies!

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: It is so helpful when baking and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dvorah Tavor

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Great little Apple peeler. Wasn’t sure it would peel a large odd shaped Apple, but worked flawlessly. Not sure how sturdy it will be.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Bess

customer_reviews.title: ease of use
customer_reviews.text: this peeler is wonderful. It peels perfectly and fast! Wet the bottom of the suction cups and it will stick to a smooth surface. I highly recommend this peeler
customer_reviews.author: jamie schramak

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very good product loved it good quality plastic. Great for Apple's
customer_reviews.author: Yasser

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Apple Peeler
customer_reviews.text: This product peels apples in three seconds, it is amazing and so fast. I used to dread apple pie making until this happened. This sounds like an infomercial, but really. It peels apples like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not functional
customer_reviews.text: This does not work at all. If you spin the Apple with your hand and hold machine with other hand you can kind of make it work but it’s not at all as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: quick, easy, clean
customer_reviews.text: I'm an apple sauce maker. Hand peeling was the worst. This new device is not only convenient, but essential.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is super effective and useful. I can peel an entire bushel of apples faster than I could do 1 by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Super easy!
customer_reviews.text: I hate apple peels and this is perfect and super easy to use! The suction is pretty bad and too bad it doesn't core the apple too. But for the price this is pretty wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Anna R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so easy to use and easy to clean. My kid loves watching it peel an apple. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a toy, but it really works
customer_reviews.text: This product is remarkably good. It is simple and fun to use. It peels smaller, smoother apples like galas better than larger, more irregularly shaped apples
customer_reviews.author: Steve Metz

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality but decent for the price. The suction isn’t the best and if you have a slightly I round Apple it knocks the blade off.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Saves time
customer_reviews.text: Having this peeler has made making baby food so much faster.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works great w/o suction
customer_reviews.text: The suction power doesn’t work so I just hold it down. Peels beautifully
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Peeling made easy
customer_reviews.text: This peeler made apple peeling so easy! I’ve already used it several times to prepare homemade apple pie filling.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: It works great and very easy to use. Definetely worth the investment if you like peeled apples.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and it saves lot of time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nothing
customer_reviews.text: I liked it very much easy to use, I used to peel apple and pear.
customer_reviews.author: siraz lalani

customer_reviews.title: Fun kitchen gadget
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great, my daughter's new favorite way to eat apples
customer_reviews.author: William Anthony Betts

customer_reviews.title: Dies not slice or cut but does peel so buy as a peeler only air better yet use a knife
customer_reviews.text: Was not a mandolinse at all would love to return or trash cheap plastic
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Apple peeler.
customer_reviews.text: When I received it in the mail I tested it out and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J Beatty

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how long it will last, but so far good
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: It's not the item I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: It's a toy and not good for use as a peeler.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Radzi

customer_reviews.title: Good product and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: I peeled 15 apples in a very short time. Easy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect and works better then most ive used
customer_reviews.author: Erika Stimson

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it came with the peeler and most of the apple coring devices were the same price in store. I peel all my apples because I just don't like the apple peels. This worked fabulously!! I've attached a picture of my first apple peeled with it. I did cut a couple of bad spots off my apple before taking the picture so you'll notice a couple notches taken out of it. It peels the apple and doesn't waste any of the apple! The coring device also works really well too. Overall, they are both super easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany T.

customer_reviews.title: Great idea! Bad workmanship.
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest, friendliest Apple peeler I have ever used. But the plastic parts that take a lot of movement and tension are flimsy. This product probably will not last for long. I am keeping it because I enjoy using it. But I know it will not last long. They need to improve this product by making the parts that take tension thicker, or making them metal. It is sad that such a good design is made like this. I would pay more if it meant it will last as much as the other metallic ones.
customer_reviews.author: Byron-57

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to use. Very few moving parts. Just need to be careful of the sharp blade (use the plastic cover) when putting on and taking off the apple. It worked on my large apples to make dumplings and on an Asian pear. My kids loved helping me peel the apples and I loved having them in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: JooJi

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would help me since I have arthritis but in reality, I end up having to peel portions. Depending how big the apple or the shape of the apple it will peel in some weird way leaving skin pieces behind. I tried potatoes too and even worse! Basicly miss mist if the potatoe. I remember as a kid in the 90's having one like this but betyer made. Hope I find another like it that works good.
customer_reviews.author: Spudkatt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome device!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job well! Love taking the apples for use either to eat right away or to cook for sweet treats! I use the cutter that cores and slices at the same time with this device! It makes it easier to remove the skin of apples so I can easily and quickly prepare them for baking or for frying.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Fast apple pies, shakes, and more! Cut down on time it takes to make healthy stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product the only thing that you need to be aware of is when you are using it keep your fingers out of the way! I was spending 2 hours trying to prep my shakes for the week and apples are a part of my shakes now its 30 min and that's it! Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Janet N

customer_reviews.title: Great tool.
customer_reviews.text: The directions are useless. But you don't need them. The product works fabulous. I have the peeler spiralizer for my kitchen aid and it peels too much off. This is PERFECT. The cutting blade is lethal be careful and supervise kids!
customer_reviews.author: Cold hands, warm heart

customer_reviews.title: Fast but watch out!!!
customer_reviews.text: I, like some others, made the mistake of trying to take the apple off with the razor in the wrong place and cut myself pretty badly. It’s a mistake you only make once LOL. Super fast and easy. I love apple desserts but rarely make them because I HATE peeling apples. This thing will make fall Apple season so much better!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Good product low price.
customer_reviews.text: I was very sceptical when I bought this product. I tried one of those older peelers that clamps to the counter and it was a pain to use and did a poor job. This was much lighter and held to the counter. After 4 crock pots of Apple Butter, I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Best ever.
customer_reviews.text: Very fast to peal an apple and rinses clean easily. The blade and spike guards fit perfectly. It’s the first plastic one I’ve used, so far much better than the metal ones, which had many nooks and crannies that were hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Not too old

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life?!
customer_reviews.text: This item is wonderful... it peels apples super-quickly and easily. I wish I had bought one years ago! - easy to use - easy to clean - light weight
customer_reviews.author: holidaygolightly

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Took all the work out of peeling apples for a pie. My hands hurt too much to peel by hand anymore so this tool does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R. Vough

customer_reviews.title: Apple pealer needs some improvement
customer_reviews.text: I love what it does but the blade falls off to easily. It does cut off more than just the skin. I don't see an adjustment for that.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie in MD

customer_reviews.title: amazing apple peeler
customer_reviews.text: It does an amazing job of peeling apple. Had a bit of struggle getting apple off holder but my hands are weak.
customer_reviews.author: sififan

customer_reviews.title: Great peeler.
customer_reviews.text: Got it out of the box rinsed it off and assembled the handle. Used it with ease. The kids thought i was so cool.
customer_reviews.author: Markie-mazon

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This thing works slicker than snot on a rain coat!
customer_reviews.author: slimfatman

customer_reviews.title: so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: very easy to use. so far, I have only used it on small apples and it was speedy and great. It took me a try or two to get the apple peeled correctly (operator error!). I will try on larger apples next week, but so for it is great.
customer_reviews.author: historical fiction lover

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Easy to use, on all sizes of apples, & quick clean-up! Make sure to move the blade before you remove the apple!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing apple peeler
customer_reviews.text: It was for my grandma! She said it’s grandma approved!
customer_reviews.author: destinie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work very well. The blade got dull and kept coming off. I ended up cutting my fingers pretty badly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what I needed it to do. Cut my peeling time in half
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dillard

customer_reviews.title: Great for pealing but won’t stick.
customer_reviews.text: This does a great job of pealing apples but will not stay attached to counter.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: slide an apple, and turn the handles, works flawlessly. cleaning might be a problem, as it is not easy to clean the blade the spikes
customer_reviews.author: EasyGuy

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: My 12 yr old uses it all of the time. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good Apple Peeler
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup, use, and clean. Does a good job!
customer_reviews.author: judith a sakasegawa

product_meta.title: Valuetools Apple Peeler Slicer - Strong Suction Base With 2 Steel Blades with Protect Cover
product_meta.description:
Peeling all types of apples within 5 seconds or less:

The chore of peeling apples won’t be one hard work thanks to the new apple peeler. With its simplified mechanism made from food grade ABS, stainless steel blade and needle, an integrated spring loaded arm and four suction-cup for stability.

This manual peeler is an ideal product to peel apples and pears effortlessly in a snap.

The apple pre-peeler only remove the skin of the fruit.

Compared to the traditional peeling way, Our new peeler provide a more convenient, safer and faster peeling way. It will save you much time and efforts on peeling apples and pears, and it is also easy to clean and store.

Kindly reminder:

When when not in use. When storing, keep out of reach of children.

feature_bullets: THOUGHTFUL DESIGN: When crank the handle, the spring loaded arm will automatically adjust the shape of the apple. Ultra sharp stainless steel blades peeling the apple skin smoothly and fast. Four suction-cups keep the apple peeler stable on clean and smooth countertop.

EASY TO USE: Fix the apple on the needle, crank the handle, and the stainless steel blade will automatically peel off the skin of the apple. Rotate the knob, and then you can enjoy your apple within 5 seconds! Running without electricity! Even Child and arthritics can operate it!
NO WASTE: the apple peeler only peel the skin off the apple, not the pulp. Extremely convenient, save your both time and efforts. Perfect for family use and apple pie.
EASY TO CLEAN: You just need to rinse steel needle and peeling blade (the blade can be removed) by water and dry with a kitchen towel. Wipe other soiled areas with a wet towel and then dry it.
EASY TO STORAGE: the size of the apple peeler is 8.66*4.53*5.9in, it is very fit for storage. An apple a day, keeps the doctor away!
